snippet.title: Evercore Heroes - Official New Map reveal! | #OTKGamesExpo #summergamefest2023
snippet.description:
Check out our brand new trailer for Hardfrost Harbour revealed at the #summergamefest2023  #OTKGamesExpo 

Battle across the frozen landscape of Heartrock Harbour, now bitterly referred to by the locals as Hardfrost Harbour. Protect your Evercore from attacks by Wolves, Golems and Yetis and take down the mighty Wintress Frostweaver in the never before seen head-to-head challenge. 

Closed beta begins June 20th! Pre-order now for the special Vela Beko Skin & 1st Emote! https://store.evercoreheroes.com

Find out more and get to know your fellow heroes on Discord: https://discord.gg/playevercoreheroes

Welcome to a Lumerea, a world of magic & heroes.

Evercore Heroes is a unique, competitive PVE game where players compete to prove they are the world’s best team of heroes. Set in a rich, science fantasy world called Lumerea, the game breaks new ground by combining the real-time, skill-based teamplay and action of MOBAs with the adventure of co-operative MMO dungeon runs.

In Evercore Heroes, four teams of four compete with each other simultaneously in a brand-new session-based PVE experience. To win, players must power up their heroes, charge their Evercore, and triumph in the final head-to-head challenge. The best teams will work together to find the right composition and strategy, balancing tradeoffs between building their own power and making the battle more difficult for the other teams. 

Our Socials:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/evercoreheroes
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@evercoreheroes 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/evercoreheroes/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vela.games/

Credits:
Video: https://Raid.gg
Music: Tal Richards

Copyright 2023 Vela Games Limited. All Rights Reserved
